questions.q: What services does KMAX Logistics provide?
questions.a: We offer specialized heavy haul solutions including ocean freight for machinery, air cargo for urgent parts, oversized road transport, warehousing, and customs clearance.

questions.q: How fast can I get a shipping quote?
questions.a: Most standard machinery quotes are delivered within 4 hours. Complex, oversized project quotes typically take 24-48 hours.

ODC refers to cargo that extends beyond the standard dimensions of the deck of the truck/trailer (length, width, height) or exceeds the standard weight limits. We specialize in obtaining necessary permissions and safe transport for such cargo.

questions.q: Do you handle route surveys for ODC?
questions.a: Yes, for all Over-Dimensional and Heavy Lift consignments, we conduct detailed route surveys to identify obstacles like low bridges, narrow turns, and weak culverts to ensure safe passage.
Please contact our support team directly regarding hazardous material transport, as this requires specific compliance checks depending on the nature of the cargo.

questions.q: How do you ensure the safety of heavy machinery during transit?
questions.a: We use certified lashing and securing systems, hydraulic axles for weight distribution, and experienced operators. All distinct operational risks are assessed prior to movement.

questions.q: How do I track my heavy shipment?
questions.a: You'll receive a unique tracking ID and access to the KMAX Logistics portal for real-time GPS updates on your cargo's location.

questions.q: Who do I contact for updates?
questions.a: You will be assigned a dedicated project manager who will be your single point of contact for all updates and queries regarding your shipment.
